claim: The X-axis of the chart represents the years.
label: Supports
explanation: This claim supports the information presented in the chart as it provides a clear label indicating the temporal progression of the data being analyzed. The X-axis is crucial for understanding the trends and patterns over time that are depicted in the chart. By labeling it as 'Year', the viewer can easily associate the varying data points along the X-axis with specific years, facilitating a better comprehension of the overall trends reflected in the visual representation.
